summary: Marketplace application for selling original products with batch image upload functionality, integrated category management within posting system, batch pricing, and integrated Stripe payment processing with shopping cart functionality
architectural_notes: Batch upload system with multi-image support
One-to-one relationship: each uploaded image becomes a product
Batch pricing mechanism during upload process
Stripe payment integration for card processing
Admin panel for payment method configuration
Dual checkout paths: instant Buy Now and shopping cart checkout
Admin authorization system with UI-based admin management
Category management integrated directly into posting/upload flow
Preset categories with minimum pricing constraints
known_issues: Image upload not functional - images cannot be uploaded when creating products

existing_features.title: Create a category management system allowing users to add, edit, and delete product categories with support for subcategories (nested hierarchy)
Implement batch image upload functionality where users can select a category/subcategory and upload multiple product images at once
Add batch pricing functionality allowing users to set a single price that applies to all products in the current upload batch
Create a product listing view displaying all products organized by categories and subcategories with their images and prices
Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, earthy tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) and clean typography that conveys handcrafted authenticity suitable for an original products marketplace
Add Stripe configuration to admin settings allowing administrators to securely store Stripe publishable key and secret key for payment processing
Add a 'Buy Now' button to each product card in the ProductGrid that initiates immediate single-item Stripe checkout
Implement shopping cart/basket functionality allowing users to add multiple products before proceeding to checkout
Create a checkout page/modal where users can review their basket and complete payment via Stripe for multiple items
Add UI controls in CategoryManager component to create subcategories under existing parent categories with a hierarchical selection interface
Update BatchUploader component to support selecting both parent categories and subcategories in a hierarchical dropdown or nested selection interface
Enhance CategoryFilter component to display categories and subcategories in a collapsible hierarchical tree structure with parent/child relationships
Update ProductGrid and product listing views to display subcategory information alongside or instead of parent category when products belong to subcategories
Add a new 'Settings' tab in the AdminPage component alongside the existing 'Upload Products', 'Manage Categories', and 'Stripe Configuration' tabs
Create a general application settings form allowing administrators to configure store name, store description, and contact email
Add currency selection setting allowing administrators to choose from common currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, CAD, AUD) for product pricing
Add tax rate configuration setting allowing administrators to set a percentage-based tax rate for orders
Create a React Query hook (useSettings) for fetching and mutating application settings similar to the pattern used in useQueries.ts
Refactor the CategoryManager component to improve the UI/UX for creating and managing hierarchical categories and subcategories with better visual organization
Add delete functionality to the CategoryManager component allowing administrators to remove categories and subcategories
Add edit functionality to the CategoryManager component allowing administrators to rename existing categories and subcategories
Enhance the category hierarchy management to support drag-and-drop reordering of categories and subcategories
Add a new 'Admin Management' tab in the AdminPage component alongside existing tabs ('Upload Products', 'Manage Categories', 'Stripe Configuration', 'Settings')
Create an AdminManager component that displays the current list of admin principals with their principal IDs
Add form controls in AdminManager component allowing admins to add new admin principals by entering a principal ID
Add remove functionality in AdminManager component allowing admins to revoke admin access from other principals
Create custom React Query hooks (useAdmins, useAddAdmin, useRemoveAdmin) in a new file for managing admin data similar to the pattern used in useQueries.ts and useSettings.ts

Add a new UI component or section in the admin interface that allows administrators to add individual products (not batch upload) with the ability to select an existing category/subcategory or create a new one during the product creation process
Create a React Query hook useAddProduct for creating individual products that integrates with the new backend addProduct function
Debug and fix the error preventing administrators from adding new categories in the CategoryManager component within the admin panel
Debug and fix the error preventing administrators from adding new subcategories under existing parent categories in the CategoryManager component
Add error logging and user-friendly error messages in the CategoryManager component to help identify the root cause of category creation failures
Verify that the useAddCategory and useUpdateCategory hooks in useQueries.ts correctly handle the backend API responses and error states
Debug and resolve the error that occurs when opening the categories page in the admin panel, ensuring the page loads without errors
Enhance the CategoryManager component error handling to display specific, user-friendly error messages when category or subcategory creation fails, replacing generic error notifications

Verify that the useAddCategory and useUpdateCategory React Query hooks correctly handle backend responses, error states, and cache invalidation to ensure the UI updates immediately after successful operations
Ensure the CategoryFilter component on the marketplace page correctly filters products by both parent categories and subcategories, displaying only products that match the selected category hierarchy

Add comprehensive console logging in the CategoryManager component and useQueries hooks to log all category operations (add, edit, delete) with request payloads, response data, and error details for debugging
Remove the 'Manage Categories' tab from the AdminPage component, eliminating the standalone CategoryManager component from the admin interface
Integrate category management functionality directly into the SingleProductUploader component, allowing users to add, edit, and delete categories inline during the single product upload workflow
Enhance the CategorySelector component to support inline category management operations (add, edit, delete) directly within the dropdown interface
Debug and fix the error that occurs when administrators attempt to add a new category through the CategorySelector component in the SingleProductUploader workflow

Add comprehensive error logging in the CategorySelector component to capture the full error details including error message, stack trace, request payload, and response data when category creation fails

Verify that the useAddCategory hook in useQueries.ts correctly handles the backend addCategory API response, properly invalidates the React Query cache, and triggers UI updates after successful category creation
Display minimum price requirements in the frontend when users select a category during product upload (single or batch)
Display auto-generated product descriptions in the ProductCard and product detail views
Debug and fix the error in the CategorySelector component that prevents administrators from successfully adding new categories during the product upload workflow
Verify the useAddCategory hook correctly handles the backend addCategory API response, including proper error handling, cache invalidation, and UI state updates
Add comprehensive error logging in the category creation flow to capture request payload, backend response, error stack traces, and mutation state transitions
Display user-friendly error messages in the CategorySelector component when category creation fails, replacing generic error notifications with specific actionable feedback

Fix the Select.Item component in CategorySelector to ensure all Select.Item elements have non-empty value props, resolving the validation error 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
Verify that the CategorySelector dropdown correctly displays all categories and subcategories with proper value assignments after fixing the empty value issue
Debug and fix the image upload mechanism in BatchUploader component to ensure images can be successfully uploaded to the backend blob storage when creating products in batch mode
Debug and fix the image upload mechanism in SingleProductUploader component to ensure images can be successfully uploaded to the backend blob storage when creating individual products
Add image editing functionality allowing administrators to replace or update product images after initial upload in both SingleProductUploader and product management interfaces
Add UI controls in ProductCard or a product management view that allow administrators to initiate image editing for existing products
Create React Query hook useUpdateProductImage for updating product images with proper cache invalidation to ensure ProductGrid displays updated images immediately

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement batch image upload functionality organized by categories
Auto-create products from uploaded images (one product per image)
Add batch pricing feature to set price for all products during upload
Automatically create one product per uploaded image, where each image becomes a distinct product in the marketplace
Integrate Stripe payment processing with admin configuration settings
Add 'Buy Now' button on each product for immediate single-item purchase
Implement shopping basket functionality for multi-item checkout
Add backend functions to create Stripe checkout sessions using stored API keys, supporting both single-item and multi-item purchases
Expand admin settings with additional configuration options
Add backend data model and functions to store and retrieve general application settings (store name, store description, contact email)
Add admin management feature allowing existing admins to authorize new admins through the UI
Add backend function getAdmins() that returns the list of current admin principals
Add backend function addAdmin(principal: Principal) that adds a new principal to the admins list
Add backend function removeAdmin(principal: Principal) that removes a principal from the admins list
Add ability to select or create categories when adding individual items/products
Add backend function addProduct(name: Text, price: Nat, imageUrl: Text, categoryId: Text) that creates a single product with specified details and associates it with an existing category
Verify that the backend addCategory and updateCategory functions in main.mo correctly handle category and subcategory creation with proper validation and authorization checks
Verify and fix the backend addCategory function to ensure it properly handles category creation with validation, authorization checks, and error responses
Verify and fix the backend updateCategory function to ensure subcategories can be created under parent categories with proper parent-child relationship validation
Remove standalone category management page and integrate category management into the posting/upload system
Integrate category management functionality directly into the BatchUploader component, allowing users to add, edit, and delete categories inline during the batch upload workflow

Verify that the backend addCategory function in main.mo correctly validates input parameters, performs authorization checks, creates the category with proper structure, and returns appropriate success or error responses
Implement auto-generation of product descriptions
Implement automatic product description generation in the backend based on product name and category

Verify the backend addCategory function correctly validates input parameters, performs authorization checks, creates categories with proper structure, and returns appropriate success or error responses
Create a preset category named '3d print' during application initialization if it does not already exist
Create a preset category named 'ceramic' during application initialization if it does not already exist
Ensure preset categories ('3d print' and 'ceramic') appear in the CategorySelector dropdown and CategoryFilter components immediately after system initialization
Create a subcategory named 'shape type' under an appropriate parent category
Create a new subcategory named 'shape type' under the '3d print' parent category in the backend category hierarchy
Update the migration module to ensure the 'shape type' subcategory is created under '3d print' during canister upgrades if it does not already exist
Fix image upload functionality to allow successful upload of product images during product creation (single and batch)
Add image editing functionality allowing users to modify/replace product images after upload
Verify that the backend blob storage functions correctly handle image data, store blobs with proper metadata, and return accessible URLs or blob IDs for frontend consumption
Create backend function updateProductImage that accepts a product ID and new image blob, replaces the existing image reference, and returns the updated product data
